WORKERS'
COMPENSATION
FUND CONTROL
BOARD
Memorandum
To: {{ doc.memo_to or "WCC" }}
From: {{ doc.memo_from or "DI" }}
Date: {{ doc.memo_date or frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation) }}
Subject: {{ doc.memo_subject or "PROJECT SITE HANDOVER FOR RENOVATION WORKS AT BUTEKO HOUSE" }}

I refer to the above subject.

Following the practical completion of the {{ doc.project_name or "Renovation works at Buteko House" }}, the Consultant has invited the Board to a meeting for official handover of the property back to the Board.

The meeting has been scheduled to take place {{ doc.handover_meeting_date or "15th December 2023" }}, {{ doc.handover_meeting_time or "08:30 hours" }} at {{ doc.meeting_location or "Buteko House" }}. The Consultant shall provide lunch at {{ doc.lunch_location or "Crossroads Hotel" }}.

We seek your approval for Senior Management staff to participate in this program.
Please find attached herewith agenda for your reference.



{{ doc.signed_by or "MOSES SIMBEYE" }}
name: Site Handover
